column2: IDEA-199694 Preserve line breaks in XML when reformatting.

column3: The line breaks of Xml comments at the end of an XML file were not preserved when the file was reformatted.
It seems that #875 is a subset of this and thus can be closed?
Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please follow the steps described at http://www.jetbrains.com/agreements/cla/ to sign it.
Yes, thank you (sorry for the delay).
IDEA-199694 Preserve line breaks in XML when reformatting.
IDEA-199695 Place block-comment on start of lines.
